submission:
class Solution(object):
    def minChanges(self, nums, k):
        """
        :type nums: List[int]
        :type k: int
        :rtype: int
        """
        n = len(nums)
        vs = []
        i, j = 0, n-1
        while i<j:
            a, b = nums[i], nums[j]
            if a>b: a, b = b, a
            d = abs(nums[i]-nums[j])
            vs.append((d, a, b))
            i+=1
            j-=1
        vs = sorted(vs)
        n/=2
        i=0
        c=0
        r = n*2
        h = []
        while i<n:
            j=i+1
            d = vs[i][0]
            while j<n and vs[j][0]==d: j+=1
            while h:
                if h[0]<d:
                    c+=1
                    heappop(h)
                else: break
            t = n-j+len(h)+c*2
            r = min(r, t)
            while i<j:
                d, a, b = vs[i]
                d = max(b, k-a)
                heappush(h, d)
                i+=1
        return r
